summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NEXUS Pentest LLM application. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% pass rate). AI integration with GPT-5.2 works excellently. Frontend UI loads properly with good hacker aesthetic. Main issue: tool execution dialog modal not opening when individual tools are clicked.

ui_bugs.issue: Tool execution dialog modal doesn't open when individual tools (nmap, nikto, etc.) are clicked
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot access tool execution parameters dialog, blocking direct tool usage

integration_issues.issue: Terminal output doesn't update when tools are executed via Tools Panel (though backend execution works)
integration_issues.impact: Users don't see tool execution results in terminal interface

passed_tests: Tools listing API (6 categories, multiple tools per category)
File operations (sandbox init, file listing, write operations)
Frontend app loading and basic UI
Direct API tool execution (nmap simulation confirmed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix ToolsPanel component: The handleToolClick function and dialog state management needs debugging. Individual tools are found and clickable but the execution dialog modal (dialogOpen state) is not opening. Also verify terminal output integration when tools are executed from Tools Panel.
